name: Co-op Castaways (Online Multiplayer Co-op)
description:
:

This game was made in 7 days for the BlackthornProd Game Jam 3.

The theme was "Less is More". For this game, what is less for one player is more for the other. You can help your ally by taunting more monsters to attack you instead of them, and there is only one hammer that needs to be shared between the two players.

Programming and sound was done by Vykri and most art was done by Bloodinia.

If you're having any issues with the game connecting, try using Chrome. The multiplayer is built on WebRTC which is not supported by all browsers.
